p:
Second, a leaching model was applied to estimate the annual Cd and Zn concentrations in the soil leachate to groundwater for the period 1880–2100. For this, the upper 200 cm of the soil was subdivided into ten 20-cm-thick layers. The topsoil reactive concentrations were estimated from the total metal concentrations using the empirical partition-relations of Römkens et al. ( 2004):
